question: Dibru-Saikhowa Biosphere Reserve is located in which of the following states?
explanation: Dibru-Saikhowa Biosphere Reserve is located in Assam. It is a part of Dibrugarh and Tinsukia Districts of Assam. It was established in 1999. It is bounded by Brahmaputra and Lohit Rivers in the north and Dibru river in the south.
